title: Wood & Stock: Sex, Oregano and Rock'n'Roll
overview: Experience an adventure of counterculture, psychedelia, and an abundance of peace and love with Angeliâ€™s beloved comic characters, the hippies Wood & Stock. As the euphoria of the 1970s fades, it's time to focus on family and work. However, a new rock band might just rekindle the spirit of those iconic years.
